name: Mice Spy
description:
Inspired by lemmings with a pinch of extra chaos thrown in with the Eye Spy book aesthetic and some curious mice to navigate the quirky changing world. Select the abilities the mice may get and the ways in which the helper mice can help when they get too tired.

Dev log 01: Looks like level 3 didn't build quite right! Oh no! Please come try it out again after the Jam to see the whole game and a couple of updates.
